00025 int real2str(char *str, double num)
00026 {
00027   int n;
00028 
00029   n = snprintf(str, PRINT_LEN, "+%.5e", num);
00030

00040 int str2real(double *pnum, char *str)
00041 {
00042   *pnum = strtod(str, NULL);
00043 
00044   return *pnum == 0 && str[0] != '0';
00045 }

00047 int big2str(char *str, int64_t num)
00048 {
00049   int n;
00050   n = snprintf(str, PRINT_LEN, "%lld", (long long) num);
00051   return n == PRINT_LEN + 1;
00052 }

00054 int str2big(int64_t * pnum, char *str)
00055 {
00056   *pnum = strtoll(str, NULL, 10);
00057   return *pnum == 0 && str[0] != '0';
00058 }
